0.headline: Browse the internet safely
0.subline: ZeroSurf protects young users from age-inappropriate content. Verify your age with Aadhaar to unlock unrestricted browsing.

1.headline: Zero-knowledge privacy protection
1.subline: Advanced cryptography runs on your device to prove your age without revealing personal information. Your privacy stays intact.

2.headline: Quick verification with Aadhaar QR
2.subline: Scan or upload your Aadhaar QR code to prove you're 18+. The verification happens instantly on your device.

3.headline: Access the full internet experience
3.subline: Once verified, browse any website without restrictions. Social media, streaming, and all content becomes available to you.

4.headline: Safe browsing for everyone
4.subline: ZeroSurf creates a safer internet by ensuring age-appropriate content access while protecting your digital privacy.
